You are solely and fully responsible for the content of any of your Submissions to this site.
Your submission have conformed to these following guidelines:
  • Content originates with you, accurate and current.
  • Your Submissions do not infringe any third-party rights, including, but not limited to, copyright, trademark, publicity, or privacy rights.
  • Your Submissions must not be fraudulent, libellous, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, harassing, abusive, threatening, racially offensive, offensively directed towards people based on their gender or sexual orientation or be otherwise objectionable. If there is any question as to what constitutes objectionable material under these Terms of Use, ICINC is the final arbiter of what does or does not constitute objectionable material.
  • Your Submissions must not be harmful to minors in any way
  • Your Submissions must not advertise or solicit fund
  • You may not make Submissions if you are under the age of 17
  • Your Submissions must not be in violation of the guidelines set forth in these Terms of Use. Any such violation shall be a material breach of these Terms of Use.
  • ICINC will disqualify any Submissions that violate any provision of these Terms of Use and will cooperate fully with any law enforcement officials and/or agencies in the investigation of any violations. In addition, ICINC may immediately and without prior notice terminate the right to access the ICINC Sites of any user who violates these Terms of Use.
About
ICINC
Indonesia Creative Incorporated (ICINC) is an umbrella program to promote and market creative economy champions and/or products to potential domestic and international markets. With the spirit of “Indonesia Rising”, ICINC as one of the project from Indonesia Agency for Creative Economy (BEKRAF) hopes to weave the new Indonesia creative economy brands into popular consumer culture--from Indonesia to the world stage!
BEKRAF
Badan Ekonomi Kreatif/BEKRAF (Indonesia Agency for Creative Economy) was established to cultivate and optimize various points of marketing for national creative products and services, both domestically and abroad. It seeks to facilitate funding access for national creative industries to sources of funds, foster growth of new alternative sources of funds and facilitate research and education development on the national creative economy, as well as appreciation and financial optimization for intellectual property rights. Every BEKRAF program and activity seeks to fulfill its vision of increasing the GDP, export value, and labor in the Creative Economy sector.
88rising
88rising is a media company founded by Sean Miyashiro that is, in their words, dedicated to “celebrating global Asian culture." An American mass media company that founder Sean describes as a "hybrid management, record label, video production and marketing company". The company has gained popularity as a musical platform and label primarily for Asian artists, such as NIKIi, Keith Ape, Rich Brian, Joji, and Higher Brothers. Headquartered in New York City, the company also has offices in Los Angeles and Shanghai.
Program
ICINC is looking for a new Indonesian vocalist to thrive on the world stage, with the following criteria:
Solo Vocalist
Indonesian Citizen
Min. 17 Years Old
Never Banned for Visiting Us
English Fluency is not Compulsari
Musical Instrument Skill Is Not Compilmentary
Videos submitted can be a cover or original song
Videos submitted don’t contain racist or pornographic content
Willing to follow through the whole ICINC program
Willing to stay in Los Angeles if shortlisted to Top 5
Willing to sign a contract with 88Rising, BEKRAF, partners/sponsors, and program’s organizer regarding program’s promotion, content & publication
Phase
Participants who’ve gone through the curation process will go through a selection process as follow
Open Call - Scouting
Open Call: Apr 23 – May 30, 2019
Top 50: June 13 – 18, 2019
An open call to invite new, talented musicians with the ambition for world’s market which will be led by 88rising
Artist Mentorship
Jul - Aug 2019
3 selected finalists will undergo a 2-months bootcamp in Los Angeles with 88rising to prepare themselves for launching their career in the US
Single Release & Concert
Aug 2019
These new talents will be introduced by releasing their single in the US market. 88rising will produce the single for these finalists
Be The Star
Are you the next rising star? Be part of a new movement through a collaboration with the forefront of Asian culture based movement in the world! Get a once in a lifetime opportunity of building your singing career in Los Angeles, coached directly by 88rising and release your very own single for the US market.
